event.title: It's raining but so colorful! -雨カラーい夜-
event.description:
It’ll start from 6pm and 1,500yen (2 drinks included)!
There will be musicians, painters, a calligrapher and photographers performing/exhibiting our own works :)

This is gonna be my first and last show in Kansai, Janan so I’ll do my best to entertain you at the night :D!
Please make sure you’ll be free for the show!!!

Time: 6-10pm, June 5th (Sat)
Place: Bo Tambourine Cafe in Motomachi, Kobe
Price: 1,500yen (inc. 2 drinks)

musicians: Aoki Yoma, Ohta Hiroshi, Gajin, Andrew Brasher and Justin Bacon
live painters: Chip Boles, Tsunekage Sayako
live calligrapher: Eguchi Masa
photographers: Emerald Huang, Epson, Takito Ayako and me
(there are artists I asked to show their works there so far)
event.address: 兵庫県神戸市中央区北長狭通３－３－７
event.place: ボ・タンバリンカフェ
